DOC.brief_summary: The Multidimensional Fatigue Inventory ( MFI ) 20-item self-report instrument design measure fatigue . It cover follow dimension : general fatigue , physical fatigue , mental fatigue , reduce motivation reduce activity . Fatigue Severity Scale ( FSS ) contain nine statement rate severity fatigue symptom . The purpose study translate fatigue questionnaire -MFI- -FSS- Taiwan-version , examine reliability validity scale . A hundred adult people without diagnosed physical mental disability recruit . Subjects fill Taiwan-version MFI , FSS , SF-36 Pittsburg Sleep Quality Index ( PSQI ) establish validity . Subjects re-fill MFI FSS one week later evaluate test-retest reliability . Another twenty people familiar English Chinese recruit evaluate translation reliability . Subjects fill English version MFI FSS , , fill Taiwan-version MFI FSS least ten minute apart . The translation reliability evaluate paired test intraclass correlation coefficient .
DOC.brief_title: Reliability Validity Taiwan-version Multidimensional Fatigue Inventory Fatigue Severity Scale
